thread.title: Kim Bach
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Kim Bach

author: Kim Bach
title: Kim Bach
text: We reached out trying to order last minute calendars. The customer service we received from Jaimie was great! She worked with us to create our design and we had the exact calendar with artwork ordered within about 20 minutes. Everything shipped/arrived as scheduled and was exactly what we wanted and was identical to the proof! Will definitely be re-ordering for next year!
